For Schools

For LAUSD Schools:

If you’d like BEAM to offer lessons at your school, shoot us an email at uclabeam@ucla.edu! We’re looking to expand to more Title I schools in the 2020-2021 school year. Our current curriculum is tailored to 4th- and 5th-grade science standards but we’re open to working with other grade levels as well.
